name: big-pearl
short_effect: Sell for 3750 Pokédollars, or to Ore Collector for 7500 Pokédollars.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A lovely large pearl
that would sell at a
high price.

A lovely large pearl

flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:

in a pretty silver color.
It can be sold at a high price.
